patches.title: mageMagick has a possible use-after-free write in its PDB decoder
patches.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the PDB decoder that will use a stale pointer when a memory allocation fails and that could result in a crash or a single zero byte write.

```
==4033155==ERRO

patches.title: Bugsink is vulnerable to Stored XSS via Pygments fallback in stacktrace rendering
patches.description:
### Summary

An unauthenticated attacker who can submit events to a Bugsink project can store arbitrary JavaScript in an event.
The payload executes only if a user explicitly views the affected Stackt
